cleaned_text: AGENDA STATE OF CONNECTICUT STATE BOARD OF NATUROPATHIC EXAMINERS Tuesday , May 4 , 2021 at 8:30 AM Department of Public Health 410 Capitol Avenue, Hartford, CT CALL TO ORDER I. Minutes Review and approval of the minutes from February 26, 2021. II. New Business A. License Reinstatement Review Mitchell Kennedy, ND Presented by Celeste Dowdell, License and Applications Analyst III. Additional Agenda Items ADJOURN THIS MEETING WILL HEDL BY VIDEO CONFERENCE State Board of Naturopathic Examiners via Microsoft Teams Join on your computer or mobile app Click here to join the meeting Or call in (audio only) +1 860 -840-2075 - Phone Conference ID: 201 316 810# The following minutes are draft minutes which are subject to revision and which have not yet been adopted by the Board. The Connecticut State Board of Naturopathic Examiners held a meeting on February 26, 202 1 at the Department of Public Health, 410 Capitol Avenue, Conference Room 3 -C, Hartford, Connecticut. BOARD MEMBERS PRESENT: Jonathan S. Raistrick, ND Chairman Lauren Young, ND BOARD MEMBERS ABSENT: None ALSO PRESENT: Jeffrey Kardys, Board Liaison Olinda Morales, Hearing Officer The meeting commenced at 8:35 a.m. via Microsoft Teams I. MINUTES The minutes from December 4, 2020 and December 18, 2020 were reviewed and approved on a motion by Dr. Raistrick, seconded by Dr. Young. II. New Business Approved Schools of Naturopathic Medical Education Dr. Raistrick made a motion, seconded Dr. Young, that pursuant § 20 -37, the Board recognizes only those schools accredited by or in candidacy status with the Council on Naturopathic Medical Education. The motion passed. The Board submits the following list to the Department of Public Health as being the approved list of Naturopathic colleges or institutions from which graduates are eligible for licensure in Connecticut. Bastyr University Naturopathic Medicine Program 14500 Juanita NE Kenmore, WA 98028 Phone: (425) www.bastyr.edu National University OR 97201 Phone: (505) 552 -1660 www.nunm.edu Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine & Health Sciences 2140 E. Broadway Rd. Tempe, AZ 85282 Phone: (480) 858 www.scnm.edu The Canadian College 1255 Sheppard Avenue, East Toronto, Ontario M2K 1E2 Phone: (416) -1255 www.ccnm.edu Page 2 of 2 The Unive rsity of Bridgeport College of Naturopathic Medicine 60 Lafayette Street Bridgeport, CT 06601 Phone: (203) 576 -4109 https://www.bridgeport.edu/naturopathy Boucher Institute of Naturopathic Medicine 435 Columbia Street New Westminster, BC V3L 5N8 Phone: (604) 777 -9981 www.binm.edu National University of Health Sciences 200 E. Roosevelt Road Lombard, Illinois 60148 Phone: 800.826.6285 www.nuhs.edu Rico 00778 Phone: (787) 743 -7979 uagm.edu III. ADJOURNMENT There was no further business and the meeting was adjourned at 8:43 a.m. Respectfully submitted, Jonathan S. Raistrick, ND, Chairman Connecticut State Board of Naturopathic Examiners
